document_data.name: Lisstra
document_data.mainbody: '''Lisstra''' was a hunter and treasure hunter in the [[Moonwood]].
document_data.Personality: Lisstra was a reserved individual, partially because of her poor knowledge of the [[Common]] language.
document_data.History: In [[1484 DR]], Lisstra and her companions [[Dran]] and [[Garn (Dran's brother)|Garn]] followed [[Karrik]] to explore the ruins of [[Methegrist]].
